H0.text: In which sport would you use a spider. Rock Climbing

H1.text: In which sport would you use a spider. Sailing

H2.text: In which sport would you use a spider. Gymnastics

H3.text: In which sport would you use a spider. Snooker - It's a tall rest

A4.text: Climbers can control rope descent and arrest falls by creating friction between the device and the rope.

A5.text: A belay device is a mechanical piece of climbing equipment used to control a rope during belaying.
